plugin.name: GUI
plugin.description: The GUI configuration plugin extends the configuration of graphical user interfaces to various options to adjust the look and feel.

parameter.name: location
parameter.description: Specified the location and the structure of the map tiles to be used. This path is composed of zero or more directives and must include at least one conversion specification which starts with is introduced by the character % followed by a conversion specifier. Valid specifiers are s (replaced by tile ID), l (tile level), c (tile column) and r (tile row). An example for using the OpenStreetMap file structure is /path/to/maps/%l/%c/%r.png.

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: Projection of the map tiles. Supported formats are: rectangular and mercator.

parameter.name: cacheSize
parameter.description: Cache size of the map tiles. If 0 is specified a default cache size of 32mb is used. The higher the cache size the better the performance in higher resolutions. A higher cache size causes less image loader calls but requires more client memory.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Used to distinguish tile store implementations provided by plug-ins.

group.name: scheme
group.description: This group defines various color and font options for SeisComp3 graphical user interfaces. There are various conventions to define colors, fonts and gradients. A color is defined in HTML convention. If rgb or rgba is used it must be quoted because the comma is handled as list separator by the configuration. Gradients are configured as lists of tuples where each tuple is colon separated in the form value:color. Color is again a color definition and value is either int or double.

parameter.description: Show menu bar.

parameter.name: showStatusBar

parameter.name: tabPosition

parameter.name: residuals
parameter.description: The gradient of arrivals residuals. A gradient is defined as a list of tuples separated by colon where the first item is the value and the second is the color. Colors can be given in rgb notation or hex. when rgb is used double quotes are needed to protect the comma inside the rgb definition, e.g. -8:"rgb(0,0,100)", -4:"rgb(0,0,255)", -3:"rgb(100,100,255)", ...

parameter.description: The station symbol size (e.g. in scmv).

parameter.name: originSymbolMinSize
parameter.description: The origin symbol minimum size. The formula to compute the size of the origin symbol is: 4.9*(M-1.2).

parameter.name: vectorLayerAntiAlias
parameter.description: Should the vector layer in the map use antialiasing? This improves the visual quality but decreases performance.

parameter.name: bilinearFilter
parameter.description: Should the map use a bilinear filter? The bilinear filter improves the visual quality but decreases performance slightly. It is only used for static map images. Not while dragging.

parameter.name: showGrid
parameter.description: Should the map display the grid?

parameter.name: showCities
parameter.description: Should the map display the cities?

parameter.name: cityPopulationWeight
parameter.description: Controls at which zoom level a city will be visible. The following formula is used: screen_width (km) * weight >= population

parameter.name: showLayers
parameter.description: Should the map display the custom layers?

parameter.name: visibleColumns
parameter.default: M, TP, Phases, Lat, Lon, Depth, Stat, Agency, Region, ID
parameter.description: Configure the columns of the event list that are visible initially. The first column containing the origin time is always visible and cannot be hidden. Possible values are: Type, M, TP, Phases, Lat, Lon, Depth, Stat, FM, Agency, Region, ID.

parameter.name: regions
parameter.description: Configured a list of regions that can be used as filter of the result set.

struct.description: Defines a rectangular region that can be used as a result set filter on client side.

parameter.name: name
parameter.description: Defines the name of the region that shows up in the listbox.

parameter.name: rect
parameter.description: Defines a rectangular region with a list of 4 values: latmin, lonmin, latmax, lonmax.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Defines the text of the option "Show only own events".

parameter.name: whitelist
parameter.description: Sets a list of preferred agencies. Events from preferred agencies are defined as "own" events.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: Sets the type of the filter. If type is "events" the agency of the preferred origin of the event is checked. If type is "origins" the agency of all origins of an event is checked and if at least one origins agency is part of the whitelist it will pass the filter. Or in other words, the event is hidden if no origin is from a preferred agency.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Show only own events" option.

parameter.name: label
parameter.description: Defines the text of the option "Hide other/fake events".

parameter.name: blacklist
parameter.description: List of event type to be hidden if the "Hide other/fake events" option is ticked.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Hide other/fake events" option.

parameter.name: enabled
parameter.description: Sets the default state of the "Hide events outside" option.
